about_the_game:
Content includes:
  • Silverwing Supply Station : This distinguished silverwing dispenses a little bit of supply after the completion of every mission.
  • Bonus Supply : An additional 100 supplies to upgrade your abilities and bolster the rebellion.

The Silverwing Supply Station can be found in the Hideout, near the training grounds (Yops station). The bonus supplies will be added to your inventory.

The Silverwing Supply Station Pack is included with the The Mageseeker: A League of Legends Story™ Deluxe Edition.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10, 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Core2 Quad Q6600 / AMD Phenom II X4 965
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 550 Ti 1 GB / Intel Iris Plus / AMD HD 6770
  • DirectX: Version 11
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10, 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel i5-750 / AMD Phenom II X4 965
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 650 Ti 1 GB / AMD HD 6770
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Additional Notes: 4K @ 60FPS: Intel i5-750 / AMD A8-6600K, 8GB RAM, GeForce GTX 660Ti 3 GB / AMD Radeon R9 280x / Intel Arc A380
